2+1.sig_info: Rising in power through sorcery and subterfuge, Loki generates one bar of Power over 15 to 6 seconds. as long as he is below 1 bar.

BASIC ATTACKS: While the opponent is Cursed, Loki has a 17.50% chance to Stun the opponent for 1 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: While the opponent is Cursed, this attack deals guaranteed Critical Hits. Additionally, it has a 100% chance to reset the duration of Curse.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Steals all of the opponent's Buffs. Stolen Buffs last for 7.5 second(s).
65% chance to reset the duration of Curse.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If Loki has more Health points than his opponent, he has a 100% chance of dealing Energy Damage equal to 7% of their max Health. This damage cannot exceed 100000 damage.
This attack is Unblockable.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Loki Curses the opponent, dealing 138.59 Energy Damage and allowing him to steal any of the opponent's Buffs for 10.50 seconds. Stolen Buffs last for 7 second(s).
